violations.description: Hard wait adds fixed latency and flakiness.
violations.code_snippet:
// Wait briefly for any potential update
      await page.waitForTimeout(300);

recommendations: Remove hard waits and rely on deterministic signals.
Allow parallel execution wherever data isolation permits.
Use targeted selectors and efficient setup to reduce runtime.
summary: performance analysis found 1 violation(s): 0 HIGH, 1 MEDIUM, 0 LOW.
